messages.message: Random question, but has anyone seen a significant slowdown in their vscode, specifically when making edits to go files? Problem persists after restarting laptop. Think I only started seeing this after the recent macos upgrade.
I sometimes have that when some process started by the go extension was occupying lots of cpu usage. Usually killing that process fixes it

Gotcha, I think I have similar problem for me where a go formatter runs after I save and that takes up lot of cpu usage. Cancelling it sometimes fixes it but sometimes just freezes it. Have never had this problem with the formatter before :thinking_face: . Might just stop the formatter from auto running on save.
